items.title: Score $1,500 savings during NIU’s Valentine’s Day Sale on the BQi-C3 Pro or BQi Fat Tire 300 e-bikes at lows from $899
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing Valentine’s Day Sale, and coming alongside our earlier coverage of the up to $700 e-scooter savings, we wanted to shine a spotlight on the e-bike section of offers. One notable return is the brand’s BQi-C3 Pro Commuter e-bike at $999 shipped, which comes in gray, black, or white colorways, and is dropping down from its $2,499 MSRP here. Over the last year we regularly saw discounts taking the costs down between $1,500 and $1,299, with occasional falls lower, though since Black Friday we’re seeing more regular returns to the $999 low. During this sale, you’re getting another shot at the lowest price we have tracked, giving you a highly capable commuter with $1,500 savings. Head below to browse the full lineup of deals while they’re still around.

items.title: Save up to 51% on Hiboy EVs, like the S2 Max e-scooter with up to a 40-mile range at $495 (Reg. $650), more from $300
items.summary:
Hiboy has an ongoing Valentine’s Day Sale that is seeing up to 51% discounts on its e-scooters and e-bikes (and an extra 5% savings on orders with any two of the models listed below), as well as 25% accessory discounts. One of the more affordable means to commute longer distances during this event is the Hiboy S2 Max Electric Scooter down at $494.99 shipped, which also matches in price at Amazon. While it may carry a $835 MSRP direct from the brand, you can more often find it regularly at $650, with discounts over the past year having gone as low as $490. Jumping on this deal gives you the second-best price of the last year, courtesy of the $155 markdown off the going rate (and $340 off the MSRP), landing it just $25 above the all-time low last seen in 2024. As cheaper alternatives in this series, you can also find the 25-mile trekking S2 Pro e-scooter at $423 (and matching at Amazon), while the entry-level S2 e-scooter with a 17-mile range is down at $300 (also matching at Amazon). You’ll find the brand’s eligible offers of alternate EVs collected for you below.

more…

items.title: In one swoop, Trump kills US greenhouse gas regulations
items.summary: The Trump administration just eliminated the landmark finding that has underpinned federal regulations on planet-heating pollution since 2009. For nearly the past two decades, the "endangerment finding" has allowed the Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) to craft rules limiting greenhouse gas emissions under the Clean Air Act. Rather than repealing those rules individually, the Trump administration […]

items.title: Stack discounts and save a huge $933 on Lenovo’s Legion Pro 7i RTX 5080 OLED gaming laptop today (All-time low)
items.summary:
We just spotted a deal at Lenovo that gets you one of the brand’s Legion Pro 7i RTX 5080 gaming laptop for $2,037.49 shipped once you enter promo codes BUYMORELENOVO and EXTRAFIVE during checkout. Lenovo currently has this particular notebook with a 16-inch OLED panel listed for $3,720, although it’s been going for $2,970 at Best Buy where it’s currently down to $2,640 with a relatively smaller discount. You’re essentially saving as much as $933 by stacking the promo codes at Lenovo’s online store today, making this one of the best deals we’ve tracked for an RTX 5080 gaming laptop this year yet. We’ve seen the variant of this laptop with an RTX 5070 GPU go for less, but this is the lowest price we’ve tracked for this config with a Core Ultra 9 and an RTX 5080, and it makes this laptop a lot easier to recommend.
